author: jorton
msg: - more cleanups, add more error checking
- add missing call to apr_proc_mutex_child_init() so the
test works on platforms which use flock() locking (e.g. FreeBSD)
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: jorton
msg: Pass NULL to apr_proc_mutex_create rather than the invented filename

author: jorton
msg: CuTest-ify and clean up the testprocmutex test:
- make the increment operation use a slow load/increment/store cycle.
- dropped support for specifying a lock filename, hopefully that is
- try using anonymous shm then name-based shm; fail gracefully
rather than segfaulting if neither works.
